list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: most people know that CFCs can damage the ozone layer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hầu hết mọi người biết rằng CFC có thể làm hỏng lớp ozone

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have developed a relationship with (someone) through meeting and spending time with them; be familiar or friendly with.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh biết và kính trọng Laura
